Mgbanwe ihu igwe bụ nnukwu ihe egwu nye gburugburu ebe obibi na ndị obodo Madagascar
Mgbanwe ihu igwe emeela ka okpomọkụ dị elu, mee ka oge ọkọchị dị ogologo ma mekwaa ka oké ifufe na-ekpo ọkụ dị ike
A na-emetụta gburugburu ebe obibi pụrụ iche nke obodo ahụ, ndụ anụmanụ nakwa osisi
A na-atụ anya na mgbanwe ihu igwe ga-eweta mbelata nke coral reefs na ebe obibi nke ọhịa, ma na-eyikwa egwu ụdị ala dị ka lemurs
Ọnụ ọgụgụ ndị mmadụ nọ n'ihe ize ndụ nke ukwuu n'ihi mmetụta siri ike nye mmiri na ọrụ ugbo, na-emetụtakwa nchekwa nri
A na-atụkwa anya na ọrịa na-efe efe ga-abawanye
Madagascar bịanyere aka na nkwekọrịta nke Paris ma nwee mkpebi iweta mgbanwe ihu igwe, ọ bụ ezie na  ha na-enweta ịhe ịmaaka na mmejuputa ha n'ihi ịda ogbenye nke obodo ahụ.
